title: Executive Order 6048-Authorizing the Appointment of Harry E. Timmis
content: Harry E. Timmis, who has been serving in a position under the Department of Commerce excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon recommendation of the Secretary of Commerce.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6048-Authorizing the Appointment of Harry E. Timmis Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361598
